content: Personal webpage of Dr. René Thiemann Computational Logic Department of Computer Science University of Innsbruck assoc. Prof. Dr. René Thiemann Department of Computer Science Computational Logic Group University of Innsbruck Technikerstraße 21a A-6020 Innsbruck Austria E-Mail: rene._mylastname_@uibk.ac.at Phone: +43/512/507 53234 Room: 3M09, 2. OG Office hours: Tuesday 10:15 – 11:15 in my office Research I am an associate professor at the Computational Logic group and was involved in these FWF projects: ARI: Automation of Rewriting Infrastructure (task leader, since 2022) Certifying Termination and Complexity Proofs of Programs (project leader, 2014-2021) Constrained Rewriting and SMT: Emerging Trends in Rewriting (task leader, 2012-2015) Improving Certifiers for Termination Proofs (project leader, 2010-2014) My fields of interest include but are not limited to: Program verification, in particular by using interactive theorem proving (IsaFoR / CeTA, certification problem format, Isabelle, and Archive of Formal Proofs) Termination analysis (tools AProVE and TTT2, and termination portal) Term rewriting SAT and SMT solving Algebra, in particular algebraic numbers and related algorithms Upcoming events 15th International Symposium on Frontiers of Combining Systems (FroCoS 2025), September 27 – October 3, 2025
